alert.note: Alert for Custer; Fall River; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 7:25PM MDT until April 22 at 8:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Custer County in southwestern South Dakota... Northwestern Fall River County in southwestern South Dakota... Western Pennington County in west central South Dakota... Southeastern Weston County in northeastern Wyoming... * Until 830 PM MDT. * At 725 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Edgemont, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Burdock around 735 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Jewel Cave National Monument. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
